Description: Day that the patient discontinued treatment
Values: Numeric interger 0-35 or NA if they did not discontinue

Description: Day that OSCI reading is taken
Values: Numeric interger 0-35, where 0 is baseline reading

Description: OSCI (Ordinary Scale for Clinical Improvement) score of patient on given day
Values: Numeric interger 0-8 on the OSCI scale, or NA if data is missing
